name: A Vacation In Nebula
description:
Are you feeling stressed? Has life got you down? A trip to the Nebula Resort is what you need!

From a mountain hot spring to gorgeous crystal mines, equipped with bedding facilities and several other friendly guests, the Nebula Resort is a perfect cosmic getaway from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Stay for as long as you like and enjoy the wonderful sights the resort has to offer. And when you're ready to leave, you can return. But you're always welcome to come again.

A Vacation In Nebula is a short walking simulator in a surreal space setting. The goal is to explore and find seven suns. It's mostly an atmospheric moodpiece without a story, meant to be a positive and relaxing experience. Most of the world is open from the start, so you can simply enjoy searching at your own pace. 

Made for Rpg Maker Net's 1.44 Floppy Disc Drive event, in which the task was to create a game that would fit on a floppy disk. It's incredibly short and shouldn't take longer than 10-15 minutes to clear.
